channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Rethinking Comparative Advantage
item.description: This week, Bill Reinsch explores comparative advantage, the difficulty of building competitive sectors today, and why cooperation with other countries is essential.

item.title: Lost in Definition: How Confusion over Agentic AI Risks Governance
item.description: Confusion over what “agentic AI” actually means is creating governance gaps that risk flawed procurement, unclear accountability, and dangerous mismatches between autonomy and human judgment.
